query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bulk_filter_executions` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`schedule_id` int NOT NULL,
	`filter_template_id` int NOT NULL,
	`executed_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`executed_by` int,
	`execution_type` enum('manual','scheduled') NOT NULL,
	`total_applications_processed` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`applications_matched` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`actions_applied` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`affected_application_ids` text NOT NULL,
	`status` enum('running','completed','failed','cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'running',
	`error_message` text,
	`execution_duration` int,
	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	CONSTRAINT `bulk_filter_executions_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bulk_filter_schedules` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`schedule_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	`filter_template_id` int NOT NULL,
	`target_job_ids` text NOT NULL,
	`target_departments` text,
	`target_statuses` text,
	`schedule_type` enum('once','daily','weekly','monthly') NOT NULL,
	`scheduled_at` timestamp,
	`cron_expression` varchar(100),
	`timezone` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'UTC',
	`auto_apply_actions` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
	`notify_on_completion` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
	`is_active` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
	`last_executed_at` timestamp,
	`next_execution_at` timestamp,
	`created_by` int NOT NULL,
	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `bulk_filter_schedules_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

	`error_message` text,

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bulk_filter_schedules` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`schedule_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	`filter_template_id` int NOT NULL,
	`target_job_ids` text NOT NULL,
	`target_departments` text,
	`target_statuses` text,
	`schedule_type` enum('once','daily','weekly','monthly') NOT NULL,
	`scheduled_at` timestamp,
	`cron_expression` varchar(100),
	`timezone` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'UTC',
	`auto_apply_actions` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
	`notify_on_completion` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
	`is_active` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
	`last_executed_at` timestamp,
	`next_execution_at` timestamp,
	`created_by` int NOT NULL,
	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `bulk_filter_schedules_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
